issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

I've found that this error can occur if a project does not have a build/iphone directory. And the 'error' can be fixed by simply manually creating an empty build/phone.

Therefore, I suggest that Titanium Developer should either create this directory itself, or add the suggestion to create one, to the error message.

I got this error when checking a project out of source control, where the build directory is not checked in.

{html}
fields.summary: Unnecessary/unhelpful message: Not configured to run for iPhone

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed.
